title: Fix login authentication flow to resolve Version 17 login failure

requirements.text: Revert authentication logic to Version 16 state to restore working login functionality

quotes: The present version 17 i am unable to login. So you can take it from Version 16 is ok

acceptanceCriteria: User can successfully initiate Internet Identity login flow
User is redirected to appropriate page after login

requirements.text: Remove or fix the 'user is already authenticated' error message that appears after successful login in Version 16

quotes: after login i am getting the error message is user is already authenticated

acceptanceCriteria: No 'already authenticated' error displays after successful login
User can proceed directly to their dashboard without error messages
Session state is correctly managed to prevent duplicate authentication checks

constraints: Do not modify backend authentication logic
Maintain existing user session persistence behavior
